channel.title: CVE Feed for Simplenews -- Simplenews
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Simplenews -- Simplenews

item.title: CVE-2012-2724|2024-08-06T19:42:32.301Z -- simplenews -- simplenews
item.description: The Simplenews module 6.x-1.x before 6.x-1.4, 6.x-2.x before 6.x-2.0-alpha4, and 7.x-1.x before 7.x-1.0-rc1 for Drupal reveals the email addresses of new mailing list subscribers when confirmation is required, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via the confirmation page.
